MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.20am to carry out investigation to an underground fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09.45am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:54am on Wednesday, 09 December 2020
